title: why can't i log in into my account from the new client
body: It tells me choose your summoner's name but if i log in my account from the old client it logs (by the way my account is 30 level) i don't know what to do please help.

replies.body: That's really weird! Can you confirm you're logging into the correct region in the Beta Client by using the drop-down menu below the login fields?
